triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Data mining is the central discipline discussed throughout this conference proceedings.

triples.name: Data set
triples.relevance: Datasets are fundamental to the data mining work discussed, particularly large, complex, and noisy datasets.

triples.name: Algorithm
triples.relevance: Algorithms are essential sophisticated techniques needed for extracting knowledge from data.

triples.name: Data and information visualization
triples.relevance: Powerful visualization technologies are highlighted as necessary infrastructure for data mining work.

triples.name: Statistics
triples.relevance: Statistical foundations are essential for the principled analysis techniques used in data mining.
